meanings.definition: To make or become Arabic in form or character.
meanings.sent1: She arabicizes her writing style to match that of Arabic poets.
meanings.sent2: The ancient text was arabicized to preserve its cultural significance.
meanings.sent3: The old recipe arabicizes itself with the addition of traditional spices.
meanings.sent4: His artwork arabicizes the modern techniques with ancient calligraphy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful mosaic arabicizes the plain wall, adding cultural richness.

meanings.sent1: The document needs to be arabicized for the international conference.
meanings.sent2: She arabicizes the English poem into beautiful Arabic verses.
meanings.sent3: The machine awkwardly arabicizes the phrases, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent4: His voice arabicizes the foreign words, making them sound familiar.
meanings.sent5: The software quickly arabicizes the text, ensuring accurate translation.

meanings.definition: To adopt Arabic language or customs.
meanings.sent1: The family arabicizes their daily conversations after moving to Dubai.
meanings.sent2: She arabicizes her wardrobe with colorful Arabic scarves.
meanings.sent3: The cat amusingly arabicizes its meows after hearing Arabic music.
meanings.sent4: His gestures arabicize the traditional dance, adding authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The town square arabicizes with the arrival of Arabic merchants.
